block.p: Holly Beth Becker, a daughter of Iris Novit and Alvin R. Becker, both of Chicago, was married last evening to Michael John Zimmerman, the son of Jane and Ronald Zimmerman of Kings Point, N.Y. Rabbi Jerome Davidson performed the ceremony at the Plaza in New York.

The bride, 33, is a managing director and the senior Internet analyst at Lehman Brothers in New York. She graduated from the University of Illinois at Urbana-Champaign and received an M.B.A. from Harvard. Her father is a partner in Beermann Swerdlove Woloshin Barezky Becker Genin & London, a Chicago law firm.

Holly Beth Becker, a daughter of Iris Novit and Alvin R. Becker, both of Chicago, was married last evening to Michael John Zimmerman, the son of Jane and Ronald Zimmerman of Kings Point, N.Y. Rabbi Jerome Davidson performed the ceremony at the Plaza in New York.

The bride, 33, is a managing director and the senior Internet analyst at Lehman Brothers in New York. She graduated from the University of Illinois at Urbana-Champaign and received an M.B.A. from Harvard. Her father is a partner in Beermann Swerdlove Woloshin Barezky Becker Genin & London, a Chicago law firm.

The bridegroom, 30, is a portfolio manager at SAC Capital, a hedge fund in Stamford, Conn. He graduated from Harvard. His father is a partner in Sanford C. Bernstein & Company, the New York investment management firm.
